nodes.text: Sentinel Outpost was a military base established by the Galactic Republic and the Corellian Security Force at the northern end of the Black Hole region of the planet Corellia during the battle for the area.
The Republic base in the Black Hole Daily Area, Sentinel Outpost was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
